enumMember.name: unblocked
enumMember.description: No restrictions on PDP context creation

enumMember.name: blocked
enumMember.description: New PDP context creation fully blocked

enum.name: MeasurementType
enum.description: Point of reference for time measurement

enumMember.name: since-creation
enumMember.description: Relative to the PDP context creation time

enumMember.name: since-update
enumMember.description: Relative to the last PDP context update time

derivedDataType.name: HostRouteLimit
derivedDataType.description: Limitation on number of host routes when address range is received from Radius

derivedDataType.name: RangedString20
derivedDataType.description: PLMN name consists of up to 20 letters, numbers, periods and dashes

derivedDataType.name: Nsapi
derivedDataType.description: Network layer service access point identifier

derivedDataType.name: SingletonNodeName
derivedDataType.description: Type of single node name, has to be equal to 1

derivedDataType.name: CreateRequestWindowSize
derivedDataType.description: Maximum number of outstanding create requests from SGSN

derivedDataType.name: Msisdn
derivedDataType.description: Mobile Station Integrated Services Digital Network

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: The empty built-in type represents a leaf that does not have any value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

derivedDataType.name: DeletesPerSecond
derivedDataType.description: GGSN-initiated deletions per second per session controller

action.name: terminateImsi
action.description: Terminate context for Identifier for International Mobile Subscriber Identity

parameter.name: imsi
parameter.description: Identifier for International Mobile Subscriber Identity

action.name: terminateImsiNsapi
action.description: Terminate context for Identifier for International Mobile Subscriber Identity and Network layer service access point identifier

parameter.name: imsi
parameter.description: Identifier for International Mobile Subscriber Identity

parameter.name: naspi
parameter.description: Network layer service access point identifier

action.name: terminateMsisdn
action.description: Terminate context for Mobile Station Integrated Services Digital Network

action.name: terminate
action.description: Terminate all PDP contexts on the node

attribute.name: pdpContextID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: limit
attribute.description: Maximum active PDP contexts

attribute.name: updateThroughCreate
attribute.description: Enables update of PDP context through create

attribute.name: hostRouteLimit
attribute.description: Limitation on number of host routes when address range is received from Radius

attribute.name: tftRatio
attribute.description: Number of PDP contexts subject to TFT handling

attribute.name: payloadLimit
attribute.description: Maximum active payload

attribute.name: reservedSecondaryCapacity
attribute.description: Reserved secondary PDP context capacity

attribute.name: allowSecondary
attribute.description: Allow secondary contexts

attribute.name: multiSim
attribute.description: Enables support for multiple SIM cards

attribute.name: pdpType
attribute.description: PDP context type

attribute.name: ipv6Limit
attribute.description: Maximum active Ipv6 PDP contexts

attribute.name: policingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: burstTime
attribute.description: Burst time window

attribute.name: minimumBurstValue
attribute.description: Minimum burst value

attribute.name: maximumBurstValue
attribute.description: Maximum burst value

attribute.name: maximumBandwidthUplink
attribute.description: Maximum bandwidth uplink

attribute.name: maximumBandwidthDownlink
attribute.description: Maximum bandwidth

attribute.name: noPolicing
attribute.description: Turn policing off

attribute.name: sessionControlID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: dedicatedSignalingPdp
attribute.description: Enable session management for dedicated signaling PDP context

attribute.name: modifyDeleteCause
attribute.description: Add proprietary delete-cause to delete request message and modify its value in the CDR

attribute.name: interfacesId
attribute.description: Interface name

attribute.name: creation
attribute.description: PDP context creation state

attribute.name: signalingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: ggsnDeletesPerSecond
attribute.description: GGSN-initiated deletions per second per session controller

attribute.name: sgsnCreatesPerSecond
attribute.description: Maximum SGSN creates per second per session controller

attribute.name: sgwCreatesPerSecond
attribute.description: Maximum SGW creates per second per session controller

attribute.name: sgsnCreateRequestWindowSize
attribute.description: Maximum number of outstanding create requests from SGSN

attribute.name: sgwCreateRequestWindowSize
attribute.description: Maximum number of outstanding create requests from SGW

attribute.name: idleTimeoutID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: sessionTimeoutID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: radiusID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: useTimeout
attribute.description: Use idle timeout received from RADIUS

attribute.name: measurementType
attribute.description: Point of reference for time measurement

class.name: SgsnPlmnId
class.description: Timeout settings based on SGSN PLMN IDs

attribute.name: sgsnPlmnIdID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: roamingID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Maximum duration for a context

attribute.name: measurementType
attribute.description: Point of reference for time measurement

class.name: ChargingProfile
class.description: Timeout settings based on charging profile

attribute.name: chargingProfileID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: measurementType
attribute.description: Point of reference for time measurement

attribute.name: defaultID
attribute.description: Single instance node must have '1' as name

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: Maximum duration for a context

attribute.name: measurementType
attribute.description: Point of reference for time measurement

class.name: Plmn
class.description: Timeout settings based on SGSN PLMN
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='@plmnId = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Plmn/@plmnId'><name path='.'/>: plmn must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: plmnId
attribute.description: Public land mobile network name

class.name: PlmnId
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='some $plmnId in ../@plmnId satisfies (@plmnIdId = /ManagedElement/Epg/Pgw/Plmn[@plmnId eq $plmnId]/PlmnId/@plmnIdId)'><name path='.'/>: plmn-id must be configured under [managed-element epg pgw plmn]</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: plmnIdId
attribute.description: SGSN public land mobile network identifier
